mapper.select:
SELECT TAII.ID, TAII.VALID, TAII.PARENTID, TAII.DESCRIPTION, TAII.EDITABLE, TAII.VIEWABLE, TAII.NAME, TAII.AUTHTYPE FROM T_AUTH_AUTHITEM TAII WHERE
AND TAII.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_AUTH_AUTHITEM ( ID, VALID, PARENTID, DESCRIPTION, EDITABLE, VIEWABLE, NAME, AUTHTYPE ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{valid}, #{parentId}, #{description}, #{editAble}, #{viewAble}, #{name}, #{authType} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM T_AUTH_AUTHITEM TAII WHERE
AND TAII.ID = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_auth_authitem TAII
VALID = #{valid,javaType=boolean},
PARENTID = #{parentId,javaType=java.lang.String},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,javaType=java.lang.String},
EDITABLE = #{editAble,javaType=boolean},
VIEWABLE = #{viewAble,javaType=boolean},
NAME = #{name,javaType=java.lang.String},
AUTHTYPE = #{authType,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE TAII.ID = #{id}
